backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and CV data with access control, blob storage, and CRUD functions for profiles, CVs, and photos.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping showing which frontend files and components support recent CV preview redesign and print-style refinements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries of key frontend components, hooks, configuration, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Base and component-level Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that loads the React application via main.tsx and mounts it in the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that handles authentication state, profile‑setup flow, and routing between login and CV builder pages.
Header dropdown showing authenticated user info, initials avatar, and sign‑out action with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal forcing new authenticated users to enter a profile name, submitting it via mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/cv/CVForm.tsx: Comprehensive CV form handling personal details, photo upload, summary text, repeatable sections, and skill chip management.
frontend/src/components/cv/CVPreview.tsx: Renders a full CV preview card using form data, showing photo, contact info, summary, and structured sections like work experience and education.
frontend/src/components/cv/PhotoUploader: Provides image upload with validation, progress tracking, preview, and removal controls for a CV photo.
frontend/src/components/cv/RepeatableLis: Generic component for editing repeatable item lists with add, update, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCVData.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, saving, and clearing CV data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving and updating the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and detailed custom styles for CV preview layout, typography, and theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/CVBuilderPage.tsx: Renders the CV builder, loads saved CV data, manages form state, and saves serialized CV entries to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, requirements, and pending feature requests.
